knimeNode.name: Geocoding
knimeNode.shortDescription: Provides latitude and longitude for given addresses.

fullDescription.intro: This node provides latitude and longitude for given addresses by using the MapQuest Open Geocoding API or an installation of the Gisgraphy Geocoder.

tab.name: Common
tab.option: Some services enforce a request rate for the Geocoding. To satisfy this rate, the user can specify the delay between two request.
In some cases multiple results are returned for a single address. Several options are provided on how to perform in this case.

tab.name: Mapquest
tab.option: Different parts of the address have to be in seperate columns. At least one the following columns must be provided: Street, City, County, State, Country, Postal Code.
The Application Key from MapQuest. Can be obtained from "http://developer.mapquest.com/web/info/account/app-keys".

tab.name: Gisgraphy
tab.option: The address that should be geocoded.
